      </span>

           Need help with your research?
          </h2>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20651811">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20651811">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20651811">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Recommended articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20651811">
          <div id="boxatt20651811" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24171146">
              <a id="link_24171146" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=9509244500&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24171146,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24171146}); ">
               Bloom, James D. "Cultural Capital And Contrarian Investing: Robert Stone, Thom Jones, And Others." Contemporary Literature (1995).
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               References Chopin, Shakespeare, Hollywood, and gender.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170287">
              Bloom, James D. The Literary Bent. Philadelphia: UPenn Press, 1997.
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library, call # 810.90054 B655L
               <br />
               See Chapter 1, pp. 20-40.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170178">
              <a id="link_24170178" href="http://www.newcriterion.com/articles.cfm/Getting-Stoned-6682" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170178,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24170178}); ">
               Bower, Bruce. "Getting Stoned." New Criterion (1986).
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Intertextual relations between Children of Light and The Awakening.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170308">
              <a id="link_24170308" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Top?id=10070560" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170308,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24170308}); ">
               Cartelli, Thomas. Repositioning Shakespeare. London: Routledge, 1999.
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library call # 822.33 A4carte
               <br />
               See Conclusion, pp. 169-180.
               <br />
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170335">
              Hoder-Salmon, Marilyn. Kate Chopinâ€™s The Awakening: Screenplay as  Interpretation. U Florida P, 1992
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available on
               <a href="http://muhlenberg.worldcat.org/oclc/732665470">
                interlibrary loan
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170218">
              <a id="link_24170218" href="http://observer.com/2002/09/borrowing-dread-how-robert-lowell-inspired-mr-stone/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170218,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24170218}); ">
               Rosenbaum, Ron. "Borrowing Dread: How Robert Lowell Inspired Mr. Stone." The Observer, 2002.
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A critical essay on Children of Light and intertextual play with Robert Lowell's poetry and the works of Shakespeare.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170210">
              <a id="link_24170210" href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/lnacui2api/api/version1/getDocCui?lni=3S8G-BW30-0007-H10C&amp;csi=270944,270077,11059,8411&amp;hl=t&amp;hv=t&amp;hnsd=f&amp;hns=t&amp;hgn=t&amp;oc=00240&amp;perma=true" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170210,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24170210}); ">
               Strouse, Jean. "Heebiejeebieville Express." New York Times (1986).
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A lengthy New York Times book review of Children of Light, with comments about Hollywood, transgressions, The Awakening, gender, feminism, and Shakespeare.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170201">
              <a id="link_24170201" href="http://www.theparisreview.org/interviews/2845/the-art-of-fiction-no-90-robert-stone" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170201,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24170201}); ">
               Woods, William C. "Interviews: Robert Stone." The Paris Review (1985).
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Interview with Robert Stone, with references to Hollywood, gender, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20651812">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20651812">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20651812">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books, chapters, and articles?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20651812">
          <div id="boxatt20651812" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24170399">
              <a id="link_24170399" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170399,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24094329">
              <a id="link_24094329" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24094329,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170398">
              <a id="link_24170398" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170398,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24094328">
              <a id="link_24094328" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24094328,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766286}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20722790">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20722790">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20722790">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find book reviews?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20722790">
          <div id="boxatt20722790" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24170404">
              <a id="link_24170404" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170404,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24170406">
              <a id="link_24170406" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24170406,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Lolita in Allentown', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5510336" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20651814">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20651814">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20651814">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20651814">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20651814" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20651815">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20651815">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20651815">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20651815">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20651815" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
